thread.section_title: LuxHair Wigs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LuxHair Wigs | www.luxhair.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: Zoe S
thread.title_full: LuxHair Wigs reviewed by Zoe S

author: Zoe S
title: Zoe S
text: I purchased the pixie shag in medium brown gold. My sister and eight ladies at the hair salon said I looked 20 years younger!! The compliment that I valued the most was how real and natural it looked. I also want to say that it fit very comfortably on my head. I wore it all day, even in the wind and it stayed secure and looked great!! Get one, you will love it!! I do. I am going to do the buy two get one free, what a value!!!
